Youtube Controller through hand gestures<br />

Functions : <br/>
multiple_clicker(key1, key2)<br/>
clicker(key)<br/>
ytcontrol()<br/>

Gesture names-Functions : <br/> 
Rock Sign-FullScreen<br />
Fist-Forward<br />
Victory Sign-Rewind<br />
Thumbs Up-Volume Up<br />
Thumbs Down-Volume Down<br />
Okay Sign-Play/Pause<br />
